con:resource.name: /party
con:resource.con:description: Service used to work with party aggregates.

con:method.name: post
con:method.con:description: Write a party record. Adds a single payment details for a party.

con:parameter.con:name: api-message-id
con:parameter.con:description: Required: A 128-bit Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) identifying for the Message Identifier

con:parameter.con:name: api-related-id
con:parameter.con:description: Optional: A 128-bit Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) identifying for the related request Message ID

con:parameter.con:name: api-transaction-id
con:parameter.con:description: Required: A 128-bit Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) identifying for the transport transaction Identifier

con:parameter.con:name: api-transaction-timestamp
con:parameter.con:description: Required: The date and time of the transaction in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+hh:mm or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss-hh:mm

con:parameter.con:name: api-message-timestamp
con:parameter.con:description: Required: The date and time of the message in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+hh:mm or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss-hh:mm

con:parameter.con:name: api-cache-key
con:parameter.con:description: Optional: Key representing the cached content within the body. Recommended that a SHA512/256 is used.

con:parameter.con:name: api-lang
con:parameter.con:description: Required: language of the API User based on ISO 639-1: two-letter codes

con:parameter.con:name: api-country
con:parameter.con:description: Required: language of the API User based on ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 â€“ two-letter country code

con:parameter.con:name: api-organisation
con:parameter.con:description: Required: organisation identifier

con:representation.con:description: The request has been fulfilled and resulted in a new resource being created.

The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).
The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.
A generic error message, given when an unexpected condition was encountered and no more specific message is suitable.

con:resource.name: /daily
con:resource.con:description: Service used to calculate daily aggregate for specified party, currency and channel.

con:method.name: get
con:method.con:description: Returns a single daily. Retrieves daily aggregate for specified party, currency and channel.

con:parameter.con:name: api-message-id
con:parameter.con:description: Required: A 128-bit Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) identifying for the Message Identifier

con:parameter.con:name: api-related-id

con:parameter.con:name: api-message-timestamp

con:parameter.con:name: api-cache-key

con:parameter.con:name: api-lang
con:parameter.con:description: Required: language of the API User based on ISO 639-1: two-letter codes

con:parameter.con:name: api-country
con:parameter.con:description: Required: language of the API User based on ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 â€“ two-letter country code
